edit_contact_desc: Update the details for this contact.
add_contact_desc: Add a new contact to your list. Try scanning a business card!
contact_deleted_toast_desc: The contact has been successfully removed.
contact_autosaved_toast_desc: was automatically saved to your contacts.
delete_dialog_title: Are you sure you want to delete?
delete_dialog_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this contact.
no_contacts_found_desc: Add a new contact to get started.
scan_card_instruction: Align the business card within the frame
camera_permission_denied_desc: Please allow camera access in your browser settings to use this feature.
camera_permission_denied_instructions: Please enable camera access in your browser settings to scan business cards.
scanning_toast_desc: Information will be auto-filled upon completion.
scan_success_toast_desc: Contact details have been filled in.
scan_failed_toast_desc: Could not extract details from the card. Please try again or enter manually.
flash_not_supported_desc: Your device does not support flashlight control.
delete_group_dialog_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this group? Contacts in this group will not be deleted.
privacy_policy_section1_content: Welcome to BizCard Pro. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share information about you.
privacy_policy_section2_content1: All data you provide to BizCard Pro is stored locally on your device. We do not transmit or store your personal data on our servers. The data includes:
privacy_policy_section2_list1: Contact information you enter or scan.
privacy_policy_section3_content: We use the information stored on your device solely to provide and improve the app's functionality. We do not have access to this information.
privacy_policy_section4_content: We do not share your personal information with any third parties, as we do not collect it.
privacy_policy_section5_content: Your data's security is dependent on the security of your device. We recommend using your device's security features to protect your data.
privacy_policy_section6_content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy in the app.
